text: Joseph or Joe Gormley may refer to: *Joe Gormley (baseball) (1866-1950), pitcher for the Philadelphia Phillies (1891) *Joe Gormley (footballer) (born 1989), football player (Cliftonville FC, Peterborough United, St Johnstone) *Joe Gormley (trade unionist) (1917-1993), President of the National Union of Mineworkers (1971-82) *Joseph L. Gormley (1914-2004), American forensic scientist ==See also== *Gormley (surname)
title: Joe Gormley
